bib.title: Some Aspects of Semantic Representation of Polish Determiners
bib.author: Piasecki, Maciej
bib.abstract: The paper concerns some methods of semantic analysis of Polish determiners which can be used in Machine Translation. First, a brief summary of traditional approaches to the semantics of Polish noun phrases is presented together with a short discussion. The difference between reference and quantification is argued to be important for proper understanding of some phenomena. Next, a unified model for quantification and reference proposed by Hess is presented and discussed. The outline of a new solution called
